prerequisites.supportedUseCase:
* Is the workload/instance still active or online?
* What are its configurations?
* What resources are connected to it?
* What else are in the same blast radius?
* How is it connected to the Internet (external attack path)?
* Who has admin/privileged access to it? - What data stores does it have access to?

widgets.title: Connected Resources to the Instance / Workload

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}" 
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database')
  that relates to * 
return tree

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}" 
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database') as e1
  that relates to (AccessRole|Application|Cluster|CodeRepo|DataStore|Firewall|Gateway|Group|Key|Network|Project|User|UserGroup)
  that relates to * as e2
where e1._class=e2._class
return TREE

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}"
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database')
  (that (has|contains) Network)?
  (that (has|contains) Network)?
  that relates to (Gateway|Firewall)
  that allows Internet
return TREE

widgets.title: Privileged Access to the Instance / Workload

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}"
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database')
  (that has * with _class!=('Problem' or 'Alert'))?
  (that has Account)?
  (that has (Group|Organization))?
  that allows as permissions AccessPolicy
  (that (allows|assigned) AccessRole)?
  that (trusts|allows|assigned) (User|UserGroup|AccessRole|Account)
where permissions.admin=true or permissions.admin=undefined
return TREE

widgets.title: Access to Data Stores from the Instance / Workload

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}"
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database')
  (that (assigned|uses) AccessRole)?
  (that (assigned|uses) AccessPolicy)?
  that (allows|uses) DataStore
return TREE

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find Unique "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}" 
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database')
  that has (Finding|Problem) as f
return 
  f._type as Type,
  f.displayName as DisplayName,
  f.description as Description,
  f.severity as Severity,
  f.numericSeverity as NumericSeverity,
  f.status as Status,
  f.createdOn as CreatedOn,
  f.updatedOn as UpdatedOn,
  f.webLink as WebLink

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}" 
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database') as e1
  that relates to (AccessRole|Application|Cluster|CodeRepo|DataStore|Firewall|Gateway|Group|Key|Network|Project|User|UserGroup) AS r1
  that relates to * as e2
where e1._class=e2._class
RETURN
e2.displayName as Resource,
e2._type as Type,
r1.displayName as SharedResource,
r1._type AS SharedResourceType,
e2.tag.AccountName as AccountName,
e2._key as ResourceKey

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}" 
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database') AS e1
  that relates to AS r1 * AS e2 
return 
e2.displayName AS Resource,
e2._type AS Type,
e2._key as ResourceKey

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}"
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database') AS e1
  (that (assigned|uses) AS r1 AccessRole)? as e2
  (that (assigned|uses) AS r2 AccessPolicy)? AS e3
  that (allows|uses) AS r3 DataStore AS e4
RETURN 
e4._type as Type,
e4.displayName AS DataStore,
e4.encrypted as EncryptionStatus,
e4.classification as Classificaiton

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find Unique "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}" 
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database')
  that has (Finding|Problem) as f
return TREE

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}"
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database')
  (that has * with _class!=('Problem' or 'Alert'))?
  (that has Account)?
  (that has (Group|Organization))?
  that allows as permissions AccessPolicy
  (that (allows|assigned) AccessRole)?
  that (trusts|allows|assigned) (User|UserGroup|AccessRole|Account) as e1
where permissions.admin=true or permissions.admin=undefined
return
e1._type as Type,
e1.displayName as ' ',
permissions.admin as Admin,
permissions.actions as Actions,
permissions.conditions as Conditions

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find "{{hostname or instanceId or ipAddress}}"
  with _class=('Device' or 'Host' or 'Function' or 'Database')
  (that (has|contains) Network)?
  (that (has|contains) Network)?
  that relates to (Gateway|Firewall) as e1
  that allows as rule Internet
return
e1._type as Type,
e1.displayName as ' ',
e1.egressRules as EgressRules,
e1.ingressRules as IngressRules
